sentences.english: They are wavers of flags and shouters of slogans.
Bright-eyed bankers peddle ideas for other combinations.
sentences.chinese: 明眼的銀行家們爲另外的聯手行動搖旗吶喊。

sentences.english: They are waver of flags and shouters of slogans.
sentences.chinese: 他們都是些搖旗吶喊的人。

sentences.english: The next day, Zhang Ren led several thousand out of the city.
sentences.chinese: 次日，張任引數千人馬，搖旗吶喊，出城搦戰。
